author: andreas
content:
Highly interesting: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thomas_Midgley,_Jr.

Of course they knew right from the beginning what they were doing, of course this was withheld from the public, about the only astounding aspect is, that Midgley risked and subsequently impaired his own health in a staged demonstration of the "harmlessness" of his stuff.
